thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 12 of 192
thread.title: Sherri K.

author: Sherri K.
title: Sherri K.
text: Les was very helpful with helping me get the full experience with Zip Recruiter today. My Free Trial had expired before I had the time to get a full experience and Les was there to answer all of my questions as well as filling me in on a few other perks of the site and renewing my trial a bit longer! He also refreshed my job postings and reviewed them thurally before doing so. In this, I feel reassured that Zip recruiter has my business' best at interest! And will continue to look into what they have to offer. Thanks Les!
